text: Looper is a 2012 American science fiction action-thriller movie directed and written by Rian Johnson. It stars Bruce Willis, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Emily Blunt, and Jeff Daniels. It was released to positive reviews on September 28, 2012. Critic Roger Ebert gave the movie 3.5/4 stars. It won nine awards and was nominated for twenty-six. ==References== Category:2012 crime thriller movies Category:2012 action movies Category:2012 science fiction movies Category:2010s American action movies Category:2010s American crime thriller movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:2010s English- language movies Category:Dystopian movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies directed by Rian Johnson
title: Looper (movie)
